text:
Dorne Allen Dibble (April 16, 1929 – March 1, 2018) was a former American football wide receiver for the Detroit Lions in 1951 and again from 1953 to 1957. He studied at Michigan State. He was born in Adrian, Michigan.
Dibble died in Northville, Michigan on March 1, 2018 of pneumonia at the age of 88.
